column4: I've had a problem with KDE on ubuntu 11.10. I installed it from the software center and it starts up fine, but after maybe a minute the images on the desktop start having trouble updating
anyone know what my problem is?
I'm not a big fan of Unity, so I installed the kde-standard package (or was it kde-default?)
you might want to ask in  #kubuntu - they're probably more familiar with KDE issues.
